author: Maya Angelou
quote: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.

author: Nelson Mandela
quote: It always seems impossible until it is done.

author: Walt Disney
quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

author: Henry Ford
quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.

author: Steve Jobs
quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.

author: Vince Lombardi
quote: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.

author: John Lennon
quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.

author: Confucius
quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

author: Tony Robbins
quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.

author: Buddha
quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.

author: Oprah Winfrey
quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.

author: Henry David Thoreau
quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.

author: Zig Ziglar
quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.

author: C.S. Lewis
quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

author: Martin Luther King Jr.
quote: Faith is taking the first step even when you don’t see the whole staircase.

author: Marcus Aurelius
quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.

author: Rainer Maria Rilke
quote: The only journey is the one within.

author: Helen Keller
quote: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.

author: Albert Schweitzer
quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.

author: Wayne Gretzky
quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.

author: Marianne Williamson
quote: Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure.

author: Brene Brown
quote: Vulnerability is the birthplace of innovation, creativity, and change.

author: Nelson Mandela
quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.

author: J.K. Rowling
quote: It is our choices, far more than our abilities, that show what we truly are.

author: Rumi
quote: The wound is the place where the Light enters you.

author: Viktor Frankl
quote: When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves.

author: Dale Carnegie
quote: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.

author: Coco Chanel
quote: Success is often achieved by those who don’t know that failure is inevitable.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: You gain strength, courage, and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.

author: John Quincy Adams
quote: Patience and perseverance have a magical effect before which difficulties disappear and obstacles vanish.

author: Robert Frost
quote: In three words I can sum up everything I’ve learned about life: it goes on.

author: Paulo Coelho
quote: When you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.

author: Jim Rohn
quote: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.

author: Mother Teresa
quote: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.

author: Winston Churchill
quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

author: Helen Keller
quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.

author: T.E. Lawrence
quote: All men dream, but not equally. Those who dream by night in the dusty recesses of their minds, wake in the day to find that it was vanity: but the dreamers of the day are dangerous men, for they may act on their dreams with open eyes, to make them possible.

author: Victor Hugo
quote: Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise.

author: C.S. Lewis
quote: You can make anything by writing.
